briefdescription.para: Failed to get ULP processor frequency.
Failed to load program into ULP.
Failed to read a non PCM file.
Stopped (no file loaded, no task running)
A weak function that automatically stop sound play when file end.
A method that set number of channels.

parameterdescription.para: 1 for mono and 2 for stereo sound.

briefdescription.para: A method that return current volume level.
A method that play from file.
A method that play sound from host or file.

parameterdescription.para: File path or host url to play.
Username if the host require authentification.
Password if the host require authentification.

simplesect.para: true if succed to play file.
false if failed to play file.

briefdescription.para: A method that set loop of the current playing file.

parameterdescription.para: true to enable or false to disable loop.

briefdescription.para: A method that return file size.
A method that return current file position.
A method that set current file position.

simplesect.para: true if succeed to set file position.
false if failed to set file position.

briefdescription.para: A method that return current sample rate.
A method that set bit resolution of current playing file / host.
A method that return the number of channels.

simplesect.para: uint8_t Number of channels (1 for mono, 2 for stereo).

briefdescription.para: A method that return current bit rate of current playing file.

simplesect.para: uint32_t Current playing file bit rate.

briefdescription.para: A method that set current playing time.
A method that return current time.

simplesect.para: uint32_t Current playing time in seconds.

briefdescription.para: A method that return file duration.

simplesect.para: uint32_t Total playing time in seconds.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t Bit_Clock_Pin, uint8_t Frame_Clock_Pin, uint8_t Data_Out_Pin, uint8_t Data_In_Pin=(-1))
memberdef.name: Set_Pinout

briefdescription.para: A method that return total playing time.
A method that set time offset.
A method that return current playing state.

simplesect.para: false if audio is not playing.

briefdescription.para: A method that generate a tone.
A method that disable tone on pin.
A method that load sound registry.
